headline: Warner Bros. Discovery: The Folie Of Debt And Box-Office Bombs
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery's asset sales are a must at this point, and hopefully CEO acts on this sooner rather than later. Read why WBD stock is a Speculative Buy.
